de.a46.memory
Interface MultimediaProvider

All Known Implementing Classes:
Starter
public interface MultimediaProvider

Interface MultimediaProvider defines methods for creating multimediaData.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Till Zoppke

getImage

public java.awt.Image getImage(java.lang.String relativePath)
creates and returns an image defined by a relative path.

Returns:
the new constructed Image.

getComponent

public java.awt.Component getComponent()
returns a component. A component is needed to load images through a MediaTracker. In the memory the class Starter just returns an instance to itself.
Returns:
a component.
